brews.name: Week Sauce
brews.description: This lager-esque beer is also low calorie, without sacrificing flavor.

brews.name: Pagan Pale
brews.description: An American pale ale finished with dry hopping.

brews.name: Legend of the Lost Golden
brews.description: Classic golden in body, but finished with hops traditionally used in a Hazy for that super fruity aroma and finishing flavor.

brews.name: Head full of Hops and Dreams
brews.description: A strong back of tongue bitterness with heaps of late addition hops for citrus influenced flavor and aroma.

brews.name: Bet it all on Red
brews.description: Following the irish tradition of a dry finish, but with layer upon layer of caramel malts that unfold as you sip.

brews.name: Brew Looks Like a Hazy
brews.description: Light in body without being thin, this traditional Bavarian hefe is influenced primarly by clove flavors rather than banana.

brews.name: On the Dubbel
brews.description: Trappist sourced yeast combined with caramelized malts from the french countryside collide in this copper beauty.

brews.name: Tripel Trouble
brews.description: Traditionally spiced with sweet orange peel, coriander, and star anise that each make their appearance in gentle layers as you sip.

brews.name: Clocked Out
brews.description: Roasty and smokey, with a velvety texture to the last sip.

brews.name: Sneaky Fox
brews.description: High gravity and heavy hops make this a hard hitting IPA.

brews.name: Her Majesty’s ESB
brews.description: Bold, malty, and gentle amount of hops for balance.

brews.name: Magnanimous Opus
brews.description: For a long time now, I have been craving an IPA with a little more malt backbone and just the right amount of bitterness. Finished with stone fruit aromas from a combination of Azacca hops and english yeast. I made it for me, but I’ll share it with you.

brews.name: Johann Sebastian Doppelbock
brews.description: Based on a the profile and specs of a prominent authentic German Doppelbock, this dark, malty german lager has all of the chocolate and caramel notes you could ask for.

brews.name: Dry-Hopped Pacific Amber
brews.description: A well-balanced red with NW hop flair.

brews.name: Scotch Ale
brews.description: Vanilla and caramel round out this smooth high gravity beer.

brews.name: Draft Master Mike
brews.description: Vanilla and caramel round out this smooth high gravity beer.

brews.name: Barrel-aged Belgian Dark Strong
brews.description: The barrel did a majority of the work with this brew, muting the traditiuonally stong belgian character, and overpowering it with notes primarily of vanilla and chocolate.

brews.name: Rotating Guest Cider
brews.description: Ask our servers about our rotating guest cider tap.
